name: Gunfish (yarnick, knuffelturk)
description:
Gunfish

Hello this is gunfish our  pico-8 project.

We're currently working on a bullethell with pico 8, It's our first project in pico 8 and we're still learning. We would love to hear your feedback and what you would like to see in future updates. Feedback on the presentation of our game is also appreciated a lot!

Update 1: we've added a startscreen, game over screen with a highscore and a new enemy type. 

Update 2: added music, care package, tweaked enemies

Update 3: tweaked enemy behaviour, added explosion animations, tweaked bullets speed of the player and enemies

currently in development :D
